title: Bad Request
message: The server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax.

title: Unauthorized
message: You need to be authenticated to access this resource.

title: Forbidden
message: You are not authorized to access this resource.

title: Not Found
message: The requested resource could not be found on the server.

title: Method Not Allowed
message: The method specified in the request is not allowed for the resource identified.

title: Not Acceptable
message: The server can not generate a response matching the list of acceptable values defined in the request's headers.

title: Conflict
message: The request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current state of the target resource.

title: Unprocessable Entity
message: The server understands the request but cannot process it because it contains invalid data.

title: Too Many Requests
message: You have sent too many requests in a given amount of time. Please wait and try again later.

title: Internal Server Error
message: The server encountered an unexpected error and was unable to complete your request. Please try again later.
